word_mean: 腐败，腐化：部分或完全坏变

sentence.Network_en: Objective : To sum up the characteristics of X - ray and clinic for astragal putrescence.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的总结距骨缺血坏死的临床 X 线特点,提高对本病的诊断水平.

sentence.Network_en: Methods: The X - ray exhibition and clinic of astragal putrescence of 9 cases were analysed.
sentence.Network_cn: 方法对已确诊的9例距骨缺血坏死的临床 X 线表现进行分析.

sentence.Network_en: The astragal putrescence may be disassembled into three stage: putrescence stage, evolve stage and resume stage.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论距骨缺血坏死可分为坏死期、进展期及修复期, 坏死期极少见,而以进展期及修复期最多.
